A  mysterious operative, an old enemy out for vengeance, is plotting an unthinkable act of sabotage that will plunge the world into a conflict of apocalyptic proportions. An intoxicating blend of art, intrigue, and history, The Fallen Angel moves swiftly from the cloistered chambers of the Vatican, to the glamorous ski slopes of St. Moritz, to the graceful avenues of Berlin and ViennaÃ¢â‚¬â€and, finally, to a shocking climax beneath the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most sacred and contested parcel of land.
